name: DX on DX with Abi Noda, founder and CEO of DX (Changelog Interviews #551)
summary: This week Adam is joined by Abi Noda, founder and CEO of DX to talk about DX AKA DevEx (or the long-form Developer Experience). Since the dawn of software development there has been this push to understand what makes software teams efficient, but more importantly what does it take to understand developer productivity? ...
